text: Tumhi sanga, mi svatah apalyakarita tara kasalyahi labha ani hanica adhikara rakhata nahi, parantu tevadhaca jasi allahaci marji asela, pratyeka samudaya (um'mata) karita eka tharaleli vela ahe, jevha tyancya to nirdharita samaya ye'una pohocato tevha na eka ksana mage saraku sakatata ani na pudhe ja'u sakatata
